definition: to cup one's hands in salute/to surround/to arch/to dig earth with the snout/arched

sentences.english: This was the last arch stone bridge. We took a photo of team here.
sentences.chinese: 上山前最后一座石拱桥，在这里，我们集体合影留念。

sentences.english: Rigid frame tied arch bridge is a new type bridge in concrete-filled steel tube arch bridge field .
sentences.chinese: 刚架系杆拱是在钢管混凝土拱桥中出现的新桥型。

sentences.english: Visitors walk over a bridge in the Millennium City Park in Kaifeng, central China's Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 游客经过一座拱桥进入开封清明上河园景区。

sentences.english: The main bridge of the Tiangong Bridge is a steel-frame reinforced concrete arch bridge.
sentences.chinese: 天工大桥主桥为一座劲性骨架钢筋混凝土拱桥。

sentences.english: The bridge is the world's largest span arch bridge at precent.
sentences.chinese: 该桥为目前世界上跨径最大的拱桥。

sentences.english: The earliest European segmental arch bridge was built at Florence in 1345.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲最早的拱桥是1345年在佛罗伦萨建成的。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is urgent to study on masonry arch-bridge's reinforcement.
sentences.chinese: 因此，研究圬工拱桥的维修加固已是迫在眉睫。

sentences.english: Many stone bridges and arches in the city were built during the Ming and Qing dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 在明和清王朝时期修建了许多城市的石拱桥和拱门。

sentences.english: Two kinds of buffalos' frontal sinus are the thin-shell constitution as an arch bridge.
sentences.chinese: 两种类型水牛额窦内部都呈拱桥式薄壳结构。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a practical case of demolishing two reinforced concrete single-curvature arch bridges by using controlled blasting.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了两座钢筋混凝土单曲拱桥的控制爆破拆除工艺。

sentences.english: Over the river are two arched stone bridges called "Double Rainbow Bridges".
sentences.chinese: 河上有两座石拱桥，名为“双虹桥”。

sentences.english: This paper introduces several suggestion about modifying the design and construction of stone arch bridge.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍石拱桥设计和施工的几点改进意见。

sentences.english: An arch bridge is widely used all over the world with beautiful shape.
sentences.chinese: 拱桥以其优美的造型在世界各地得到了广泛的应用。

sentences.english: Through tied-arch bridge with middle boom lacked the stability.
sentences.chinese: 带中吊杆的下承式系杆拱桥存在着稳定方面的脆弱性。

sentences.english: The boys traversed a small hump -backed bridge to the opposite shore.
sentences.chinese: 两个人便走上窄小的圆拱桥，到了对岸。

sentences.english: Mr. Mao wrote in the article, "We can see stone arch bridges nearly everywhere."
sentences.chinese: 我国的石拱桥几乎到处都有。

definition: Xiao Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
